description: This file contains React components for authentication modals, including API key and OAuth authentication flows, for a frontend application. It manages UI interactions, state, and API calls related to user authentication methods.

methods.name: AuthModals
methods.description: Main component that controls which authentication modal ('API Key' or 'OAuth') is displayed based on props.

methods.name: ModalShell
methods.description: Reusable modal container component with title and close functionality.

methods.name: ApiKeyModal
methods.description: Component for authenticated via API Key, handles user input, API call, and status display.

methods.name: OAuthModal
methods.description: Component for OAuth authentication flow, including OAuth initiation, status, and redirect URL handling.
